amendment.description: To increase amounts authorized to be appropriated for youth suicide early intervention and prevention strategies grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2942 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2942 proposed by Senator Perdue for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S8910; text: CR S8910) To increase amounts authorized to be appropriated for youth suicide early intervention and prevention strategies grants.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2942 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2942 proposed by Senator Perdue for Senator Murkowski.
